bibl.title: Alexis: The Fragments. A Commentary.
bibl.note: The Greek Text is not included.
bibl.seg: ARNOTT W. Geoffrey, Alexis: The Fragments. A Commentary. (Cambridge Classical Texts and Commentaries. 31.)
Cambridge, Cambridge University Press, 1996, 8°, xxi-886 pp. ISBN 0-521-55180-3. £110.
The Greek Text is not included.

C.R. par Alain Blanchard, REG 110 (1997) pp. 674-675. - Michel Casevitz, RPhil 3e s., 70 (1996) pp. 359-360. - Daniel Donnet, AntCl 67 (1998) pp. 324-325. - Thomas Gelzer, MusHelv 54 (1997) pp. 237-238. - Hugh Lloyd-Jones, CJ 93 (1997-1998) pp. 207-208. - Niall W. Slater, CW 92 (1998-1999) pp. 300-301. - S.M. Goldberg, BMCRev 9 (1998) pp. 601-604.
